text: In this video, we will show you
how to hide your online status,
turn off your last seen status,

and turn off your read
receipts on WhatsApp.
Use the clickable sections below

to keep track of all the
steps during the tutorial.
When you receive a WhatsApp message,
don't open it right away.
First, turn on your airplane mode.
Now you can open your message
and even send a response if you like.

After, close WhatsApp and
turn off your airplane mode.

First, open your WhatsApp
app on your smartphone.
Second, select "Settings" from the menu

at the bottom right-hand
corner of the screen.
In settings, select "Account."

In the account page, find
and select "Privacy."

Tap "Last Seen" to change
your online status.
You have two options
to hide your online or last seen status.

You can choose for only "My
Contacts" to see your status
or for nobody to see your status.
Once you've made a selection,

your online or last seen
status will be visible
to just your contacts

or no one at all, depending
on your selection.
First, open WhatsApp.
Then go to settings.
Click on "Account."
Navigate to "Privacy."
Then switch off read receipts.
